description: Attackers can use findstr to hide their artifacts or search specific strings and evade defense mechanism Author: Furkan CALISKAN, @caliskanfurkan_, @oscd_initiative. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Abusing Findstr for Defense Evasion
query: (process.command_line:*findstr* AND ((process.command_line:*\/V* AND process.command_line:*\/L*) OR (process.command_line:*\/S* AND process.command_line:*\/I*)))
